title: Handle Late Rent Payment
description: A tenant's rent has not been received by the due date. The system flags the account, and the PM must take action.

tasks.description: Identify the tenant with the overdue balance from the system alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the tenant's name, unit, and overdue amount.

tasks.description: Apply the standard late fee to the tenant's ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct late fee, as specified in the lease, is posted to the tenant's account.

tasks.description: Send a formal 'Late Rent Notice' to the tenant via email.
tasks.expected_outcome: The standard legal notice is generated and sent to the tenant, and the communication is logged in the system.
